options.content: This srvice is the main integration point for Spinnaker cloud providers like AWS, Azure, CloudFoundry, GCP, Kubernetes, etc.

panels.title: On Demand Read Latency by Type (clouddriver, $Instance, $Platform)

targets.expr:
sum by (provider, account) (
# provider
label_replace(
# account
label_replace(
# query
(sum(rate(executionTime_seconds_sum{job=~"$job", agent=~".*$Platform.*",instance=~"$Instance"}[$__rate_interval])) by (agent)
),
"account", "$1", "agent", "^[A-Za-z]+/([A-Za-z0-9-]+).*"
), 
"provider", "$1", "agent", "^([A-Za-z]+).*"
)
)

/

sum by (provider, account) (
# provider
label_replace(
# account
label_replace(
# query
(sum(rate(executionTime_seconds_count{job=~"$job", agent=~".*$Platform.*",instance=~"$Instance"}[$__rate_interval])) by (agent)
),
"account", "$1", "agent", "^[A-Za-z]+/([A-Za-z0-9-]+).*"
), 
"provider", "$1", "agent", "^([A-Za-z]+).*"
)
)

panels.title: Cache Agent Execution Latency by Account (clouddriver, $Instance, $Platform)
TODO - Google Operations - Confirm metric names
Google Operation Wait Until Done Time (clouddriver, $Instance)
Amazon Client Rate Limiting by ClientType (clouddriver, $Instance)

targets.expr:
label_replace(
# query
avg(cache_drift{account=~"$Account", instance=~"$Instance"}) by (account, agent, region),
"agent", "$1", "agent",  "(.*)CachingAgent"
)

panels.description:
Inbound HTTP requests. 

`controller_invocations_total` is an enhanced version of Spring `http_server_requests_seconds_count` with additional labels.
panels.title: Inbound Request Rate by Method

panels.description:
Inbound HTTP request latencies. 

`controller_invocations_total` is an enhanced version of Spring `http_server_requests_seconds_count` with additional labels.

targets.expr:
sum by (controller, method) (rate(controller_invocations_seconds_sum{job=~"$job", instance=~"$Instance"}[$__rate_interval]))
 / 
 sum by (controller, method) (rate(controller_invocations_total{job=~"$job", instance=~"$Instance"}[$__rate_interval]))

panels.title: Inbound Request Latency by Method

panels.description:
Inbound HTTP request errors. 

`controller_invocations_total` is an enhanced version of Spring `http_server_requests_seconds_count` with additional labels.

targets.expr: sum by (statusCode, cause, controller, method) (rate(controller_invocations_total{job=~"$job", instance=~"$Instance", status="5xx"}[$__rate_interval]))
sum by (statusCode, cause, controller, method) (rate(controller_invocations_total{job=~"$job", instance=~"$Instance", statusCode="429"}[$__rate_interval]))

panels.title: Inbound Request Errors by Method

panels.description: Rate of outbound http requests to other Spinnaker services.
panels.title: Outbound Request Rate

panels.description: Latency of outbound http requests to other Spinnaker services.
panels.title: Outbound Request Latency

panels.description:
Rate of outbound http request errors when calling other Spinnaker services. 

Check the logs looking for `retrofit error` or `<--- 500`
panels.title: Outbound Request Error Rate

targets.expr:
sum by (instance) (jvm_gc_pause_seconds_sum{job=~"$job", instance=~"$Instance"}) 
 / 
 sum by (instance) (jvm_gc_pause_seconds_count{job=~"$job", instance=~"$Instance"})

panels.description: CPU Usage. Average is the average usage across all instances, max is the highest usage across all instances. As CPU Usage is a sampled metric it is best to view in relation to throttling percentage.
panels.title: CPU

panels.description: Percent of the time that the CPU is being throttled. Application may be getting throttled during bursty tasks but overall be well below its CPU limit. Throttling may significantly impact application performance.
panels.title: CPU Throttling

panels.description: Memory utilisation. Average is the average usage across all instaces, max is the highest usage across all instances.
panels.title: Memory

panels.description: Average network ingress/egress for the $spinSvc pods.
panels.title: Network
